To set a watch, you may drag a representation from the
./LocalsWindow.htm Locals Window , into a watch window, or simply type the name of the attribute into an entry in the name column of the Watch Window. If you attempt to enter a name that cannot be evaluated, or does not make sense in the current context, then an error message will be displayed.

You may also enter an expression to be evaluated. In the screenshot above, the entries in the Watch Window have been entered manually, and the result of their evaluation is displayed in the value field. The expression "a" evaluates to an array, and the screenshot demonstrates how to access individual elements of an array using the "@" symbol.
